name: bunny snuggler
notes:
meet buggy the bunny snuggler, a sweet cuddler crochet pattern. buggy makes an inseparable friend, perfect for a special gift for a little one.

this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only.  you will not receive a physical product.

skill level: advanced beginner

size: snuggler shown measures 16-1/2" from the bottom of the feet to the top of the head (excluding ears)

> please note that this pattern is
> available for free on my blog
> [here][1]. the benefit of purchasing
> this pdf is an easy to read,
> printable, and ad-free version of the
> pattern.

materials needed:

- super bulky weight #6 yarn (exact brand and colors provided)
- crochet hook sizes: us l 8.0 mm and  k 6.50 mm crochet hook
- 15mm safety eyes (embroider or crochet if for a young child)
- filberfill
- stitch markers
- tapestry needle

pattern is written in english, using standard american terms.

this pattern originally appeared on crochet 365 knit too.  the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read, printable and ad-free version of the pattern.

please review the downloading tab and note that downloads work best from a computer.

the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too. this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal, non-commercial use only. you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances. due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase.


  [1]: https://www.crochet365knittoo.com/bunny-crochet-snuggler/
